title: JUST IN: $19+ O/W Airfare Sale, Ends Tuesday!
text:
Home > Flight Deals > JUST IN: $19+ O/W Airfare Sale, Ends Tuesday! JUST IN: $19+ O/W Airfare Sale, Ends Tuesday! August 17, 2015 4:17pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Domestic nonstop flights valid for travel late August through September are now discounted by Frontier Airlines, but only through 11:59 p.m. ET on August 18. One-way travel is available with rates starting at $19 ($38 round-trip). 
Travel is valid August 25-September 26 with the exception of blackout dates during September 3-5, 7, or 8. These rates are available to Discount Den< ... more 
Domestic nonstop flights valid for travel late August through September are now discounted by Frontier Airlines, but only through 11:59 p.m. ET on August 18. One-way travel is available with rates starting at $19 ($38 round-trip). 
Travel is valid August 25-September 26 with the exception of blackout dates during September 3-5, 7, or 8. These rates are available to Discount Den members. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of this sale by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros:
